instructions: Only change code that is within the currently edited function or file.
Do not remove or change business logic unless explicitly prompted.
Follow single responsibility principle for functions.

In React Native, never place raw text inside <View>, <TouchableOpacity>, or similar components. Always wrap text content inside a <Text> component to avoid the warning: 'Text strings must be rendered within a <Text> component.'
Avoid inserting unnecessary JSX expressions like {" "}. Only use them if they are required for formatting or spacing.
Do not add JSX comments like {/* Menu displayed as overlay */} unless explicitly instructed. Keep the JSX clean and concise.
